commanding.translation[0].definitions[0]: having the authority or position that allows you to give orders
commanding.translation[0].definitions[1]: having the confidence to make people respect and obey you – used to show approval
commanding.translation[0].definitions[2]: a commanding view or position is one from which you can clearly see a long way
commanding.translation[0].definitions[3]: being in a position from which you are likely to win a race or competition easily
